# init(onSessionRequest:)

**Initializer**

Initializes the connection handler with a closure that accepts an XPC session.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor @preconcurrency init(onSessionRequest requestHandler: @escaping (XPCListener.IncomingSessionRequest) -> XPCListener.IncomingSessionRequest.Decision)
```

## Discussion

Use this initializer if your app extension communicates with the host app using types from the [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/XPC] framework.

## Initializing the connection handler

- **init(onConnection:)**: Initializes the connection handler with a closure that accepts a Foundation XPC object.
